titleStmt.title: A funerall elegie, in memory of the rare, famous, and admired poet, Mr. Beniamin Ionson deceased. VVho dyed the sixteenth day of August last, 1637, and lyeth inter'd in the Cathedral Church of Saint Peter at Westminster..
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.P. for Henry Gosson, and are to be sold at his Shop on London-bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: A-C⁴ (first and last leaves blank?).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
